titles.title: Expressing the profound regret and sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of James Earl Carter, Jr., thirty-ninth President of the United States of America.
Expressing the profound regret and sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of James Earl Carter, Jr., thirty-ninth President of the United States of America.

action.text: Without objection, the Chair laid before the House H.Res. 1626.
Mr. McHenry asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sorrow of the House of Representatives upon the announcement of the death of former President Jimmy Carter, 39th President of the United States.
